name: Sakimi Mix
description:
Early Version

So I decided to train my own checkpoint with a twist - I added Sakimi-chan's artstyle to the mix and combined it with other checkpoints through fine-tuning. But let's be real, this checkpoint is like a toddler - it's still in its early stages and may not always behave the way you want. So be warned, the style it releases may surprise you!

How To Use?

Alright, here's the deal - to use this checkpoint, you gotta type in the magic words: "sakimi mix" into your prompt. Trust me, it's mandatory, 'cause that's the trigger word that brings this checkpoint to life. Then, generate your image and transfer it to img2img to give it that extra oomph and upscale it to your heart's content. This nifty trick can help iron out any pesky defects in your image, making it look sleek and stunning. Happy creating!

meta.prompt: 1girl, sakimi mix, fighting stance, superhero, low lights, at a city, (upper body), (masterpiece)
